meanings.sent1: The jettiest rock in the whole beach stood out the most.
meanings.sent2: The lighthouse was the jettiest structure along the coast.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls fought over the jettiest spot on the pier.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the jettiest beacon of happiness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The jettiest flower in the garden bloomed brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: This dock is jettier than the one we visited last summer.
meanings.sent2: The riverbank here is jettier than the one downstream.
meanings.sent3: The sandcastle was built on the jettier side of the beach.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were jettier than usual today, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The storm made the waves even jettier than before, crashing against the shore.
